titleInfo.title: Letter, J.G.M Ramsey in Philadelphia, Penn., to "Gentlemen of Philadelphia." 1819 Nov. 19

mods.abstract: 1819 Nov. 19, J.G.M Ramsey, Philadelphia, Penn., to "Gentlemen of Philadelphia" . Apparently, a speech or letter to a newspaper in which he discusses the problem of foreigners who have come to America to improve their condition and can find no work because of the present business depression. Urges his countrymen to help them. Settlement of the western states by immigrants offered as a solution to this dilemma.
